title: US intelligence estimates Russian troop levels on Ukraine border could reach 175,000
description: New US intelligence findings estimate Russia could begin a military offensive in Ukraine in a matter of months as it amasses up to 175,000 troops along the border, a startling escalation that President Joe Biden has warned could lead to severe consequences.

title: Former Netflix engineer and accomplice sentenced to prison for insider trading
description: A former Netflix software engineer and his best friend were sentenced Friday for securities fraud, the US Attorney's Office in the Western District of Washington announced.

title: Seattle has reached a $3.5 million settlement in the fatal police shooting of pregnant mother of four
description: The city of Seattle has agreed to pay $3.5 million to settle a wrongful-death lawsuit filed on behalf of the family of Charleena Lyles, a pregnant mother of four who was shot and killed in her home by police in 2017.

title: Bitcoin plunges overnight
description: Bitcoin prices plunged overnight to a low of $45,111. As of 10:30 am EST Saturday, the cryptocurrency had dropped more than 13% in the previous 24 hours, from $56, 294 to $48,309 -- a loss of almost $8,000.

title: Tom Holland and Zendaya joke about doing 'Spider-Man' stunts with their height difference
description: Tom Holland may play a big-time superhero, but it seems his co-star Zendaya is doing all the heavy lifting.

title: Exclusive video shows arrest of Crumbley parents
description: Police arrested James and Jennifer Crumbley, the parents of the suspect in the Oxford High School shooting Ethan Crumbley, on manslaughter charges.

title: We know who is attacking us and we know how to get even, says Israel's cyber defense chief
description: On a nondescript office park in the desert town of Be'er Sheva, a "war room" filled with screens showing various maps, rolling information, and graphics inform around a dozen or so staffers, manning computers at the central heart of Israel's civilian cyber defense system.

title: Militants kill at least 31 in central Mali, say local authorities
description: Militants killed at least 31 people in central Mali on Friday when they fired on a bus ferrying people to a local market, local authorities said -- the latest deadly attack in a region racked by violent insurgency.

title: Black job applicant suing over hair discrimination, but the company claims misunderstanding
description: A Black job applicant suing an employer over hair discrimination is demanding an apology and policy change -- but the company said it was a misunderstanding.

title: US military launches investigation after possible civilian casualties in Syria strike targeting al Qaeda leader
description: US Central Command has launched an investigation after a drone strike against a senior al Qaeda leader in northwest Syria on Friday may have killed civilians, according to a spokesman for Central Command.
